alert.note: Alert for Tulsa; Wagoner (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 14 at 2:28AM CDT until June 14 at 3:15AM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 315 AM CDT FOR NORTHWESTERN WAGONER AND EAST CENTRAL TULSA COUNTIES... At 228 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 4 miles east of Tulsa, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations in or near the path include... Tulsa... Broken Arrow... Coweta... Oneta... This includes Interstate 44 between mile markers 221 and 231. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
